Contact.jumbotronSubTitle: Get in touch with our Support Staff
Contact.heading1: We'd Love to Hear From You!
Contact.headingText1: To request more informaiton, please fill out and submit the form below

Home.jumbotronSubTitle: The complete suite of enterprise-level modern cloud software services
Home.platformHeader: The Enterprise-Scale Platform as a Service

cardFeatures.title: Focus on Your Project
cardFeatures.text: With Alpha Software you don"t need to worry about infrastructure, disaster recovery, or dev ops. Through the ASCLI tool everything from servers to orchestrated deployments is one click away.

cardFeatures.title: Support for Nine Languages
cardFeatures.text: Alpha Software products support 9 or more languages. Whether you are using Java, Node, C++, Swift, Go, or Ruby your applications are already compatible with Alpha Software"s services.

cardFeatures.title: Pricing from Startups to Enterprise
cardFeatures.text: At Alpha Software we know that startups and experimentations are a core component to the success and speed of innovation in the software industry. That"s why we offer pricing from startups all the way to enterprise level businesses.

listFeatures.title: Everything You Need
listFeatures.text: We focus on DevOps, giving you more time to focus on your product

listFeatures.title: Processing
listFeatures.text: From virtual machines with proven price/performance advantages to a fully managed app development platform.

listFeatures.title: State-of-the-Art Networking
listFeatures.text: State-of-the-art software-defined networking products on Alpha Software"s private fiber network

listFeatures.title: Fully Secured
listFeatures.text: Control access and visibility to resources running on a platform protected by Alpha Software"s security model

listFeatures.title: Design Feedback Tool
listFeatures.text: Collaborate on user experience journeys with your team using Alpha Software"s EnFocus tool

listFeatures.title: Real-Time Monitoring
listFeatures.text: Monitoring, logging, and diagnostics and more, all in an easy to use web management console or mobile app.

testimonials.author: Elizabeth Marner
testimonials.title: CEO, Boca Cola
testimonials.quote: Using AlphaSoftware’s Cloud Platform, the campaign runs smoothly 24/7 and includes redundancy, failover techniques, backups and state-of-the-art monitoring. Plus, it’s affordable.

testimonials.author: Miguel Killorn
testimonials.title: CEO, Abocado
testimonials.quote: The ease, integration and scalability that Alpha Softwareoffers with Cloud Platform allow us to offer the best online grocery shopping around.

testimonial.author: Jay Oakerson
testimonial.title: CEO Abocado
testimonial.quote: With Alpha Software powering all of our customer-facing services and ASCC, helping us monitor and understand application performance, Abocado is in great shape to create and release new products.
